customProperties.armorEffects: When dealing Fire damage to a creature, you heal 1d4 hit points per every 10 fire damage dealt to that creature.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Taking fire damage causes this weapon to deal an additional Fire damage on the next attack made with it equal to a number of d6s per every 10 fire damage taken (rounded up, minimum 1, calculated before resistances/immunities/vulnerabilities).

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: When dealing Fire damage to a creature, you heal 1d4 hit points per every 10 fire damage dealt to that creature.

Weapon Effects: Taking fire damage causes this weapon to deal an additional Fire damage on the next attack made with it equal to a number of d6s per every 10 fire damage taken (rounded up, minimum 1, calculated before resistances/immunities/vulnerabilities).
